verses.name: Genesis 24:9
verses.text: And the servant put his hand under the thigh of Abraham his master, and sware to him concerning that matter.

verses.name: Genesis 24:10
verses.text: And the servant took ten camels of the camels of his master, and departed; for all the goods of his master were in his hand: and he arose, and went to Mesopotamia, unto the city of Nahor.

verses.name: Genesis 24:11
verses.text: And he made his camels to kneel down without the city by a well of water at the time of the evening, even the time that women go out to draw water.
